sentences.english: The headquarters of the organization is located in National Taipei University of Technology.
sentences.chinese: 本社社址位於臺北科技大學校區。

sentences.english: A team at U. C. San Diego had been searching for it.
sentences.chinese: 加大聖地牙哥校區的研究小組一直在尋找這個反射器。

sentences.english: It's a pretty small campus, so there are multiple campuses.
sentences.chinese: 這個校區面積不大，所以學校有許多不同的校區。

sentences.english: It's a pretty small campus, so there are multiple campuses.
sentences.chinese: 這個校區面積不大，所以學校有許多不同的校區。

sentences.english: The College is located on the north campus of the university.
sentences.chinese: 化學與材料科學學院的教學和科研活動在北校區進行。

sentences.english: The new campus is LEED certified, and the company is working on reduced packaging.
sentences.chinese: 新校區LEED認證，公司正在減少包裝工作。

sentences.english: These universities' new campus mostly are located in Jinming district.
sentences.chinese: 這些高校的新校區大多都在金明區轄區內。

sentences.english: The new campus has been basically completed and fully operational.
sentences.chinese: 新校區現已基本建成，並全面投入使用。

sentences.english: Students must remain on campus at all times.
sentences.chinese: 學生在營隊期間不得擅自離開校區。

sentences.english: The New Campus of Jianghan University covers an area that is 3 times as big as the old campus.
sentences.chinese: 江漢大學新校區的佔地面積是老校區的三倍。

sentences.english: The New Campus of Jianghan University covers an area that is 3 times as big as the old campus.
sentences.chinese: 江漢大學新校區的佔地面積是老校區的三倍。

sentences.english: I am currently a student at Chang'an, Xi'an University of Technology campus.
sentences.chinese: 我就讀於西安科技大學的長安校區。

sentences.english: With the campus spread out so far, many students ride bicycles instead of walking.
sentences.chinese: 校區散佈整個海城，許多學生以腳踏車代步。

sentences.english: Southwest Jiaotong University, Emei Campus 36th Party Schools talented students.
sentences.chinese: 西南交大大年夜峨眉校區第三十六期黨校優良學員。

sentences.english: Campuses may be a lot bigger than in high school.
sentences.chinese: 校區也比高中的時候大很多。

sentences.english: It is the annual awards ceremony at the C. W.
sentences.chinese: Post校區一年一度的頒獎典禮。

definition: the Great Learning, one of the Four Books 四書|四书[Si4 shu1] in Confucianism
land used for growing plants/site used for public recreation/abbr. for a place ending in 園|园, such as a botanical garden 植物園|植物园, kindergarten 幼兒園|幼儿园 etc
abbr. for 師範大學|师范大学[shi1 fan4 da4 xue2], normal university/teacher training college
site developed for a group of related enterprises/(industrial or technology) park
